revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Internal | name = DoomBuilder camera | class = DoomBuilderCamera | doomednum = 32000 }}[[Classes]]: DoomBuilderCamera
[[Doom Builder]] places this thing on the maps it edits for its 3D editing mode. They have no possible use in the game, and destroy themselves instantaneously, but this class exists anyway to prevent them from being interpreted as [[Classes:Unknown|map errors]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR DoomBuilderCamera { States { Spawn: TNT1 A 1 Stop } }
